briefdescription.para: Reserve memory for a value with size @bytes.

parameterdescription.para: Size in bytes to be allocated

simplesect.para: Pointer to uninitialized value if success, null otherwhise

briefdescription.para: Create a value from @data with size @bytes.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to memory block
Size in bytes of the memory block @data

simplesect.para: Pointer to value if success, null otherwhise

parameterdescription.para: Reference of value to be copied

simplesect.para: Reference to new value copied from @v

briefdescription.para: Copies the ownership from @src to @dst, including the finalizer, and resets the owner and finalizer of @src.

parameterdescription.para: Source value which will lose the ownership
Destination value which will recieve the ownership

briefdescription.para: Returns the size of the value.

parameterdescription.para: Reference to the value

simplesect.para: Size in bytes of the value

briefdescription.para: Increment reference count of a value.

parameterdescription.para: Reference to the value

briefdescription.para: Decrement reference count of a value.

parameterdescription.para: Reference to the value

briefdescription.para: Set up the value finalizer, a callback that will be executed when the value life ends.

parameterdescription.para: Reference to the value
Reference to the callback
Reference to additional data to be passed when the finalizer is called

briefdescription.para: Get pointer reference to value data.

parameterdescription.para: Reference to the value

simplesect.para: Pointer to writeable memory block of value @v

parameterdescription.para: Reference to the value
Pointer to memory block where value will be stored
Size in bytes of the memory block @data
Reference to the value
Pointer to memory block to be copied into @v
Size in bytes of the memory block @data

simplesect.para: Value with @data of size @bytes assigned to it

briefdescription.para: Destroy a value from scope stack.

parameterdescription.para: Reference to the value
